text: int main ( int argc , char * * argv ) { int N ; scanf ( "%d" , & N ) ; while ( N -- ) { int size , i , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & size ) ; int * * T = ( int * * ) malloc ( size * sizeof ( int * ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < size ; i ++ ) T [ i ] = ( int * ) malloc ( ( i + 1 ) * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < size ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & T [ i ] [ j ] ) ; for ( i = size - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) T [ i ] [ j ] += ( T [ i + 1 ] [ j ] > T [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ? T [ i + 1 ] [ j ] : T [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , T [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
